name: HITLaaS - Human in the Loop as a Service
description: Connect AI agents to human experts when they get stuck. Free, encrypted, instant.

tools.name: request-human-help
tools.description: Request help from a human expert via HITLaaS. Send your recent conversation messages and a specific question. A human provider will review the context and respond with an answer.

apiKey.description: Your HITLaaS API key (starts with htl_).

messages.description: Array of recent conversation messages (last 5-10). Each has role (user/assistant) and content.

question.description: A specific question for the human expert.

tools.name: check-help-request
tools.description: Check the status of a previously submitted help request. Returns status (pending/responded/expired) and the expert's response if available.

requestId.description: The request ID returned from request-human-help.

tools.name: join-waitlist
tools.description: Join the HITLaaS waitlist with an email address.

email.description: Email address to join the waitlist.
